attributes.action: Allow Civil or Humanist Celebrants to perform Legal Marriages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to campaign on behalf of fellow Civil and Humanist Celebrants.  We would like the law to be changed so that we can legally marry couples.  We know that this has been allowed in Scotland in 2005 and would like it to be possible here in England.  We feel the present Law is discriminating against people with non-religious beliefs (under the European Human Rights Act) and feel that every member of the public should have more freedom and choice to opt for a Ceremony of this nature.
attributes.creator_name: Kayleigh Ward - Association of Independent Celebrants (Founder)

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
